name: BEEP
headline: Safeguard Your Online Accounts
description: Protect your online identity by making sure your accounts and passwords are secure. Built on Vue.JS and Ionic Framework, Beep runs a security check in just one minute and keeps your passwords safe with an obfuscated hashing algorithm.
pageDescription: Protect your online identity by making sure your accounts and passwords are secure with BEEP.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: ionic vue js, ionic framework, what is ionic framework, ionic creator, ionic 4, open source software, pwa, ionic pwa, vuejs pwa, new open source projects
